title: Join Wheels Manufacturing’s “Random Derailleur Hanger of the Month Club”
content:
We all know how important the derailleur hanger is when it comes to how well your bike shifts. Well, Wheels Manufacturing (Mfg) has released a new subscription club – the Random Derailleur Hanger of the Month Club. It works like this: you sign up to receive one random derailleur hanger every month. That way, if you ever need one, you may or may not receive the one you need in the mail.

Cool, right?

But wait, there’s more!

I don’t know about you guys, but I have a bin that has so many random derailleur hangers that I’ve collected over the past decades, that I’m probably going to pass on joining this club.

But it’s not just about shifting your bike properly. Over the many years, bike manufacturers have come up with so many different shapes and sizes of hangers that there is a never-ending sea of hangers. Wheels Mfg. thought, why not make them collectible!?

Wheels Mfg Random Derailleur Hanger of the Month Club

Wheels Mfg says that the Random Derailleur Hanger of the Month Club is a “completely unnecessary, oddly satisfying subscription service“. The service promises to deliver a shiny new random derailleur hanger right to your door every month.

It may not fit your bike, but that’s ok.

What’s in the Box?

  • One completely random rear derailleur hanger
  • A collectible spec card with facts like: “Allegedly fits a brand we couldn’t verify, possibly made during a lunar eclipse in the late 1900s.”
  • A monthly opportunity to say, “What the heck is this one for?”
  • And absolutely no guarantee it fits anything you own

Trade with your friends!

Start Your Collection

After a few months of receiving the random hangers, you’ll start to need a way to display them. That’s where The Hanger Hall of Fame Display Case comes in! For true hanger honchos, or officianados, this is the ultimate hanger shrine.

Check out the details:

  • A beautifully finished 4-foot-wide walnut-paneled frame
  • 200 velvet-lined micro-shelves to display your growing hanger collection
  • Built-in LED lighting to elevate each aluminum oddity
  • A locking glass door, because some things are sacred

Subscription Pricing

$19.99/month
$249.99/year (includes mystery bolt bag and sticker that says “Life is Short, Buy the Hanger“)

Happy April Fool’s Day!!

Seriously, though, if you really are looking for a hanger that fits your bike, the Wheels Manufacturing website has a great hanger finding tool that will help you locate the right one.
